utterance: Note that if each farmer contributes 3 coins per year, the risk of pest spreading will reduce to 25%.
The collective has gathered {collectiveAVG} coins, on average, per year.
Your contribution directly affects the risk of pest spreading and at the same time your final bonus.
Note that no contribution to the collective will increase the probability of pest spreading.
Each farmer has contributed {farmerContributionAVG} coins, on average, per year.
How much you contribute each year affects both your bonus and the probability of pest spreading.
